oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Nancy Norris Loretz Warlick and Nancy Norris Warlick to Pvt. John N. Warlick
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to Pvt. John N. Warlick, Co. G, 55th Tenn. Vol. Inf. Regt., CSA, from his wife, Nancy Norris Loretz Warlick, and his mother, Nancy Norris Warlick. Included in the letter are details of the Federal occupation of the area (near Jackson, Tenn." Nancy Norris Warlick was born in 1799 in N. C. and died in 1877 in Carroll County, Tenn.
